message.relics.version.forge: §4[RELICS-WARN] §cSEEMS LIKE YOU ARE USING AN OUTDATED VERSION OF FORGE. IT'S MEAN THAT RELICS DOESN'T APPEAR IN THE DUNGEONS LOOT CHESTS. TO FIX THIS ISSUE PLEASE UPDATE YOUR FORGE VERSION TO 1.16.5-36.0.14 OR HIGHER. IF YOU FOR SOME REASONS DON'T WANT UPDATE YOUR FORGE VERSION - YOU CAN ADD OWN WAYS TO GETTING RELICS. THIS MESSAGE CAN BE DISABLED IN CONFIG
tooltip.relics.spatial_sign.shift_1: Teleports to the stored position after certain time after activation
tooltip.relics.spatial_sign.shift_2: Taking fatal damage with activated sign in inventory will save your life and teleport to a stored position, destroying the relic
tooltip.relics.reflection_necklace.shift: Slowly accumulates charges to fully reflect projectiles and incoming damage
tooltip.relics.space_dissector.shift_1: Throws a disc that bounces off surfaces and damages everyone in its path
tooltip.relics.space_dissector.shift_2: Damage dealt and time before the disc automatically returns to thrower depends on the total number of bounces
tooltip.relics.space_dissector.shift_3: Activating the disk while holding down the [Shift] key teleports to its current position
tooltip.relics.soul_devourer.shift_1: Accumulates souls of defeated entities, proportionately increasing dealing damage
tooltip.relics.soul_devourer.shift_2: Holding down the [Shift] key will release all accumulated souls, dealing damage and knocking everyone around
tooltip.relics.magma_walker.shift_1: Condenses lava underfoot, temporarily transforming it into solid magma stone
tooltip.relics.magma_walker.shift_2: Fully removes damage from a hot blocks
tooltip.relics.midnight_robe.shift_1: Grants temporary invisibility and movement speed boost at night if the wearer's health falls to a low level
tooltip.relics.midnight_robe.shift_2: Stealth attacks will deal double damage, but temporarily remove invisibility and movement speed boost effects
tooltip.relics.scarab_talisman.shift_1: Increases movement speed and step height on sand
tooltip.relics.scarab_talisman.shift_2: Increases sand breaking speed and fully removes damage from suffocating in blocks
tooltip.relics.stellar_catalyst.shift_1: Grants chance to summon a falling star while attack a mob
tooltip.relics.drowned_belt.shift_1: Grants infinity breathing, increases underwater incoming and dealing damage, reduces swimming speed
tooltip.relics.elytra_booster.shift_1: Accumulates energy from the nearest dragon breath cloud while holding [Shift] key and uses it to increase elytra flying speed while holding same key
tooltip.relics.elytra_booster.shift_2: Grants ability to ram mobs while flying on elytra with activated booster
tooltip.relics.enders_hand.shift_1: While holding down the [Shift] key, swaps positions of the player and enderman he is looking at
tooltip.relics.fragrant_flower.shift_1: Forces bees around to fight alongside with the relic wearer and makes them friendly to the player
tooltip.relics.fragrant_flower.shift_2: Bees around will also collect nectar to the buffer of this relic, which can then be released by holding down the [Shift] key to grow crops around
tooltip.relics.holy_locket.shift_1: Increases damage dealt to undead entities and grants ability to set them on fire
tooltip.relics.jellyfish_necklace.shift_: Slowly accumulates charges underwater which then can be used to deal electrical damage on collision with mobs
tooltip.relics.hunter_belt.shift_1: Doubles damage dealt to animals and loot received from mobs. Increases damage dealt by pets
tooltip.relics.rage_glove.shift_1: Increases dealt and taken damage from the same target per each combo-attack
tooltip.relics.ice_skates.shift_1: Increases movement speed and grants ability to ram mobs on ice, on high movement speed adds ability to freeze water underfoot
tooltip.relics.ice_skates.shift_2: Dealt damage and knockback force depends on amount of time spend on ice
tooltip.relics.camouflage_ring.shift_1: Grants ability to temporarily hide in a tall grass, stealth attacks will deal double damage
tooltip.relics.delay_ring.shift_1: Temporarily alters an wearer's destiny, delaying any healing and damage taken for next 10 seconds
tooltip.relics.delay_ring.shift_2: Any healing that is delayed by the ring would be doubled
tooltip.relics.bastion_ring.shift_1: Grants ability to locate nearest bastion when killing piglins
tooltip.relics.chorus_inhibitor.shift_1: Remembers the position of the chorus fruit usage, and returns to it after a certain time
tooltip.relics.chorus_inhibitor.shift_2: Additional using of the chorus fruit before time runs out will increase its supply
tooltip.relics.arrow_quiver.shift_1: Adds chance to shoot multiple arrows
tooltip.relics.lucky_horseshoe.shift_1: With a random chance increases player's looting and fortune
tooltip.relics.magic_mirror.shift_1: Teleports to latest known respawn position
tooltip.relics.ice_breaker.shift_1: Causes shockwave after player falls to the ground while holding [Shift]
